title: Holy Priest TBC Phase 1 - Pre-BiS Path

steps.title: Attunements & Keys
steps.description: Unlock heroics, raids, and dungeon access.

tasks.title: Finish Karazhan Attunement
tasks.why: Unlocks weekly Kara clears for early badges + drops.
tasks.how: Follow the Master's Key questline starting in Karazhan.

tasks.title: Thrallmar / Honor Hold to Revered
tasks.why: Heroic key + access to Shattered Halls.
tasks.how: Run Hellfire Ramparts, Blood Furnace, and Shattered Halls.

tasks.title: Cenarion Expedition to Revered
tasks.why: Heroic key + access to heroic Steamvaults.

steps.title: Reputation Upgrades
steps.description: Reps that unlock BIS or near-BIS pieces.

tasks.title: Cenarion Expedition to Exalted
tasks.why: Windcaller’s Orb is a strong pre-raid off-hand.
tasks.how: Grind Steamvaults + turn in Unidentified Plant Parts.

tasks.title: Lower City to Revered
tasks.why: Unlocks heroic Shadow Labyrinth + key healer trinkets.
tasks.how: Run Sethekk Halls/Shadow Labyrinth + Terokkar quests.

steps.title: Heroics & Gear
steps.description: Target upgrades and weekly time gates.

tasks.title: Save Badges for Icon of the Silver Crescent
tasks.why: Strong on-use mana trinket from badge vendor.
tasks.how: Complete weekly Kara + heroics to stockpile badges.
